hello @jinvan@zid :-)
:-) what is your best experience so far with ZeroNet ?
I see. good to have you here. If you tell us a little your interests, we can give you some hints, guide you
how did you start ZeroNet with Tor ? There are different ways. Also, which OS are you on ?

hm, I have no Mac. but the ways to start tor for linux are like this (see FAQ): 1. "How to use ZeroNet with Tor?" 2. "How to make ZeroNet work with Tor under Linux?" 3. "How to use ZeroNet in Tor browser?" http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/faq/#how-to-use-zeronet-with-tor
you have a terminal in Mac, and I assume its BSD like commands might also work. BUt again, I have no Mac to make a qualified statement
did you check your logs, if they tell you more info why tor doesn't work ?
sounds like it can not find tor. just a question: you have tor on your system ?

ok, then check if (1) helps you. if not: write an issue here: (2). (1) http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/faq/#how-to-use-zeronet-in-tor-browser (2) https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues
